speech: The CDC recommends washing your hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. If soap and water aren't available, use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol. Liquor shouldn't be used in place of hand sanitizer.

messages.ssml: <speak>The CDC recommends washing your hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. If soap and water aren't available, use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol. Liquor shouldn't be used in place of hand sanitizer.</speak>
